content: For release on delivery   1:00 p.m. EDT   July 17, 2013           Beyond Capital: The Case for a Harmonized Response to Asset Bubbles      Remarks by    Sarah Bloom Raskin    Member    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at    The Exchequer Club Luncheon    Washington, D.C.
